languages.text: {n}На груди лежит что-то обжигающе-холодное. На миг кажется, что это и есть настоящ{rt_mf|ий|ая} вы — тот самый осколок воли, потерянный в потоке. Но под пальцами всего лишь колье из тассерция.{/n}

{n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На груди лежит что-то обжигающе-холодное. На миг кажется, что это и есть настоящ{rt_mf|ий|ая} вы — тот самый осколок воли, потерянный в потоке. Но под пальцами всего лишь колье из тассерция.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

{n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

{n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的手摸到了胸口的什么东西，某种冰冷的东西灼痛了你的手指。有那么一刻，你以为那是你迷失在意识洪流中的碎片，是你真正的灵魂，但事实上，那不过是挂在你胸前的塔瑟拉水晶项链罢了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的手摸到了胸口的什么东西，某种冰冷的东西灼痛了你的手指。有那么一刻，你以为那是你迷失在意识洪流中的碎片，是你真正的灵魂，但事实上，那不过是挂在你胸前的塔瑟拉水晶项链罢了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu mano toca algo en tu pecho, algo tan frío que te quema los dedos. Durante un instante crees que se trata de tu verdadero yo, el fragmento de tu voluntad que se ha perdido arrastrado por la corriente, pero resulta que es un simple collar de thassertio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu mano toca algo en tu pecho, algo tan frío que te quema los dedos. Durante un instante crees que se trata de tu verdadero yo, el fragmento de tu voluntad que se ha perdido arrastrado por la corriente, pero resulta que es un simple collar de thassertio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elin, göğsünde bir şey buluyor. Bu, parmaklarını yakacak kadar soğuk bir şey. Bir an için bunun gerçek sen olduğunu, akışta kaybolmuş iradenin kıymığı olduğunu düşünüyorsun. Ancak bunun bir tasertiyum kolyeden başka bir şey olmadığı ortaya çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elin, göğsünde bir şey buluyor. Bu, parmaklarını yakacak kadar soğuk bir şey. Bir an için bunun gerçek sen olduğunu, akışta kaybolmuş iradenin kıymığı olduğunu düşünüyorsun. Ancak bunun bir tasertiyum kolyeden başka bir şey olmadığı ortaya çıkıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの手は胸に何かを見つける。その何かはとても冷たいのであなたは指を火傷する。しばらくして、それが本当のあなたであると考える―その流れの中で失われたあなたの意識の断片―が、タッセリウムのネックレス以外の何ものでもないことがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの手は胸に何かを見つける。その何かはとても冷たいのであなたは指を火傷する。しばらくして、それが本当のあなたであると考える―その流れの中で失われたあなたの意識の断片―が、タッセリウムのネックレス以外の何ものでもないことがわかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre main trouve quelque chose sur votre poitrine. Quelque chose de tellement froid que vous vous en brûlez les doigts. Un court instant, vous pensez qu'il s'agit de votre vrai vous, le fragment de votre volonté perdu dans le courant, mais vous finissez par vous rendre compte qu'il s'agit simplement d'un collier en thassertium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre main trouve quelque chose sur votre poitrine. Quelque chose de tellement froid que vous vous en brûlez les doigts. Un court instant, vous pensez qu'il s'agit de votre vrai vous, le fragment de votre volonté perdu dans le courant, mais vous finissez par vous rendre compte qu'il s'agit simplement d'un collier en thassertium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Hand ertastet etwas auf deiner Brust. Etwas Kaltes, das deine Finger verbrennt. Einen Augenblick lang denkst du, dass ist dein wahres Ich, ein im Strom der Zeit verlorenes Fragment deines Willens ... aber ist ist nicht mehr als eine Halskette aus Thassertim.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand finds something on your chest, something so cold it burns your fingers. For a moment, you think that it is the real you — the shard of your will lost in the flow — but it turns out to be nothing more than a thassertium necklace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Hand ertastet etwas auf deiner Brust. Etwas Kaltes, das deine Finger verbrennt. Einen Augenblick lang denkst du, dass ist dein wahres Ich, ein im Strom der Zeit verlorenes Fragment deines Willens ... aber ist ist nicht mehr als eine Halskette aus Thassertim.{/n}
